module: Module-level comment: The "clock_pll" module uses a phase-locked loop (PLL) to generate two output clocks from an input clock. It employs the "altpll" component of Cyclone IV E FPGA library, mapping 'inclk0' to outputs 'c0' and 'c1' through internal signal processing and configuration. Specific parameters set operational characteristics like frequency and phase, ensuring tailored and stable clock outputs.
